recommendations: “Saurav is a very methodical and capable professional. He brings a unique blend of perseverance and ability to influence stakeholders (regardless of rank and position) to bring forth the best possible outcome with whatever playing field he is provided. My job as his manager was to provide directional and tactical inputs and he would take care of running the hard yards. While his expertise lay in supplementing the employee strength at Byjus he would constantly endeavour to make the whole process better - for both employer and prospective employees. Such credentials will serve him and any organization that he is a part of, extremely well.” Show less

“Saurav is extremely diligent at whatever project he takes up. I have seen him handle multiple responsibilities with a level of calmness and silent confidence that is rare. His connects with people at a human level and is good with both routine process driven tasks as well as unique results oriented assignments. Adaptiveness & commitment ; dedicated consistency & creative-solution finding … if you need someone you can trust to sincerely get a job done even through complexity, challenges, changes and ambiguity, Saurav will either find a way or make a way. Saurav will be asset to any organisation he works for. ” Show less
